intro.p: This helper allows you to easily paginate through a data source (anything that implements System.Collections.IList)

section.title: CreateCachedPagination(System.String cacheKey, System.Int32 pageSize, Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.DataObtentionDelegate dataObtentionCallback) : Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.IPaginatedPage
section.p: Creates a Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.Page which is a sliced view of the data source. This method first looks for the datasource in the System.Web.Caching.Cache and if not found, it invokes the dataObtentionCallback and caches the result using the specifed cacheKey

tr.td: Cache key used to query/store the datasource
Callback to be used to populate the cache
